data.md:MetaData: Meteorological observations during CYCLOPS cruise from Halifax to New York started at 1781-11-24
Ship: Cyclops (6th Rate Frigate), Voyage: Halifax - New York, 1st Observer: John Christian (Captain), Company: Royal Navy, Other ship information: 28G 593BM
CLIWOC: A Climatological Database for the World's Oceans 1750–1854 (and 10 more publications about CLIWOC results in the same volume)
